Member Function Documentation

template<class Interaction >
void McMd::ExternalPotentialImpl< Interaction >::readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Read param for external potential.

This method reads the external potential Interaction parameter block. Before calling Interaction::readParam(), it passes simulation().nExternalType() to Interaction::setNAtomType().

Reimplemented from Util::ParamComposite.
